items.title: Merge Field
items.description: A merge field (formerly merge vars) for a specific list. These correspond to merge fields in Mailchimp's lists and subscriber profiles.

merge_id.title: Merge Field ID
merge_id.description: An unchanging id for the merge field.

tag.title: Merge Field Tag
tag.description: The tag used in Mailchimp campaigns and for the /members endpoint.

name.title: Merge Field Name
name.description: The name of the merge field.

type.title: Merge Field Type
type.description: The type for the merge field.

required.title: Required
required.description: The boolean value if the merge field is required.

default_value.title: Default Value
default_value.description: The default value for the merge field if `null`.

public.title: Merge Field Public Status
public.description: Whether the merge field is displayed on the signup form.

display_order.title: Display Order
display_order.description: The order that the merge field displays on the list signup form.

options.title: Merge Field Options
options.description: Extra options for some merge field types.

default_country.title: Default Country
default_country.description: In an address field, the default country code if none supplied.

phone_format.title: Phone Type
phone_format.description: In a phone field, the phone number type: US or International.

date_format.title: Date Type
date_format.description: In a date or birthday field, the format of the date.

choices.title: Choices
choices.description: In a radio or dropdown non-group field, the available options for members to pick from.

size.title: Text Field Size
size.description: In a text field, the default length of the text field.

help_text.title: Merge Field Help Text
help_text.description: Extra text to help the subscriber fill out the form.

list_id.title: List ID
list_id.description: A string that identifies this merge field collections' list.

_links.title: Links
_links.description: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.

items.title: Resource Link
items.description: This object represents a link from the resource where it is found to another resource or action that may be performed.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: As with an HTML 'rel' attribute, this describes the type of link.

href.title: Href
href.description: This property contains a fully-qualified URL that can be called to retrieve the linked resource or perform the linked action.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method that should be used when accessing the URL defined in 'href'.

targetSchema.title: Target Schema
targetSchema.description: For GETs, this is a URL representing the schema that the response should conform to.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: For HTTP methods that can receive bodies (POST and PUT), this is a URL representing the schema that the body should conform to.

merge_fields.title: Merge Fields
merge_fields.description: An array of objects, each representing a merge field resource.

total_items.title: Item Count
total_items.description: The total number of items matching the query regardless of pagination.

_links.title: Links
